This is a compilation of all the "Something About" videos from 2021 (and January 2022)! It's been a crazy year! We ran the Pokemon Battle Simulator TWICE, went to a Storm Eagle concert with Megaman X, witnessed Cucu√≠ Ganon in all his glory, got raided by the FBI because of Pikmin Bloom then spent Christmas at Luigi's Mansion. entry.title: GIGANTAMAX Pokemon Battle Royale üí• Collab With @Lockstin & Gnoggin (Loud Sound Warning)

media:group.media:title: GIGANTAMAX Pokemon Battle Royale üí• Collab With @Lockstin & Gnoggin (Loud Sound Warning)

entry.title: MORE Missing Smash Bros Characters Drawn In The TerminalMontage Style

media:group.media:title: MORE Missing Smash Bros Characters Drawn In The TerminalMontage Style
media:group.media:description:
Make sure you watch "All Super Smash Bros Ultimate Characters Drawn in the Something Style" first! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EZNl7OXVZnE
I draw ALL the characters.. and then some extras!
There were a lot of other considerations in the "bonus character" segment of the first video that didn't make the cut, so I put together another Gallery Video with EVEN MORE Characters drawn in the Something Style!
Alternate Title: Characters That I Just Felt Like Drawing.
